caption.center: WARDELL SANDERS, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District.

opinion.posture: 3.800 Appeal from the Circuit Court for Volusia County, Shawn L. Briese, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Wardell Sanders, Polk City, Pro Se.
No Appearance for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED. See Banck v. State, 798 So.2d 814 (Fla.App. 5th DCA 2001).
COBB, HARRIS, and ORFINGER, R.B., JJ., concur.
